ages4to5.title: Ages 4 – 5

ages6to7.title: Ages 6 – 7
ages6to7.description: As they grow, Nebu grows with them. More complex stories, smart questions, and creative exploration that adapts to their evolving interests.

ages8to9.title: Ages 8 – 9
ages8to9.description: For older children, Nebu becomes a true adventure companion. Deeper conversations, problem-solving, and creative projects that challenge and inspire.

testimonial.quote: Welcoming Nebu to our household has made a huge impact! Not only has it helped our daughter feel less alone as an only child, but having a built-in companion to cheer her on is really building her confidence.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Nebu

whatIsNebu.question: What is Nebu?
whatIsNebu.answer: Nebu is an educational IoT companion that uses artificial intelligence to create interactive, screen-free learning experiences. Designed for children ages 4 to 9, Nebu tells stories, asks questions, and creates adventures that stimulate imagination and development.

howItWorks.question: How does Nebu work?
howItWorks.answer: Nebu uses custom AI to interact with your child through voice. It learns your child's preferences, interests, and name to create meaningful conversations. Parents can personalize the experience through the Nebu app, setting schedules, boundaries, and monitoring conversations.

isSafe.question: Is it safe for my child?
isSafe.answer: Absolutely. Nebu is designed with safety as a priority. All content is age-appropriate, conversations are monitored, and parents have full control through the app. There's no unsupervised internet access and all interactions are designed to be educational and positive.

ageRange.question: What ages is Nebu appropriate for?
ageRange.answer: Nebu is designed for children ages 4 to 9. The content and interactions automatically adapt to each child's age and developmental level, growing with them as they develop.

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Pre-orders will ship within 6 to 8 weeks. All pre-orders include free shipping to Peru. We'll send you email updates about your order status.

whatsIncluded.question: What's included in the purchase?
whatsIncluded.answer: The purchase includes: 1 Nebu in your choice of color, USB-C charging cable, quick start guide, and full access to the Nebu app for iOS and Android. The first year of AI updates is included.

needsInternet.question: Do I need an internet connection?
needsInternet.answer: Yes, Nebu requires a WiFi connection to function, as cloud-processed AI enables the best and safest experiences. However, once connected, data consumption is minimal.

returns.question: Can I return my Nebu?
returns.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your Nebu, you can return it for a full refund within the first 30 days of receiving it.

languages.question: What languages does Nebu speak?
languages.answer: Currently Nebu speaks Spanish and English. We're working on adding more languages in future updates.

charging.question: How is Nebu charged?
charging.answer: Nebu charges via an included USB-C cable. With a full charge, Nebu can run approximately 8-10 hours of active conversation.

hero.title:
A bond.
More than a toy.
hero.subtitle: Our mission is to build meaningful, screen-free connections through play, blending intelligent design with heartfelt simplicity to support every child's journey, one conversation at a time.

play.title: Play
play.description: We believe in the power of authentic play to develop each child's natural imagination and creativity.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Every interaction is designed with educational and emotional intention for holistic development.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Children's safety and privacy are our highest priority at all times.

design.title: Design
design.description: Elegant simplicity that allows the magic of learning to happen naturally.

safety.title: We're serious about children's safety
safety.description: We're proud to be certified by the kidSAFE Seal Program. They're an independent, global program safety certification program that verifies the online safety and privacy practices of children-friendly websites and technologies.

legal.title: Legal Terms
legal.subtitle: Legal information and policies for Flow-telligence and Nebu

content.intro: Welcome to Nebu by Flow-telligence. By using our product and services, you agree to these terms and conditions.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Nebu, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

content.intro: At Flow-telligence, the privacy of families and especially children is our highest priority.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect only the minimum information necessary to provide our educational services.
collection.item1: Verifiable parental consent before collecting information from children under 13
collection.item2: Full parental control to review, modify or delete information
collection.item3: Minimal collection of data necessary for operation
collection.item4: Absolute prohibition on sharing children's information with third parties

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use collected information solely to improve your child's educational experience.

sharing.title: 3. Sharing Information
sharing.content: We never share children's information with third parties. Your data remains private and secure.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement enterprise-level security measures to protect all information.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, modify or delete all your family's information at any time.

content.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website.

what.title: What are cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to remember your preferences.

types.title: Types of cookies
types.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics cookies to improve our services.

control.title: Cookie control
control.content: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings at any time.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Have questions about our privacy policy? Contact us:

newsletter.title: Subscribe for inspiring stories, offers & news.
newsletter.description: Stay up to date with Nebu's latest adventures and parenting tips.
newsletter.privacy: By signing up, you agree with our privacy policy.

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.subtitle: Satisfaction guarantee and return process for Nebu

mainContent.title: Return and Refund Policy
mainContent.intro: At Flow-telligence, we want you to be completely satisfied with your Nebu purchase. We offer a flexible and transparent return policy.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: You have 30 days from receiving your Nebu to decide if you're completely satisfied. If for any reason it doesn't meet your expectations, you can return it for a full refund.

process.title: Return Process
process.step2: Receive a prepaid shipping label via email
process.step3: Pack Nebu in its original box with all accessories
process.step4: Ship the package using the prepaid label
process.step5: Receive your full refund in 5-7 business days

conditions.title: Return Conditions
conditions.condition3: No significant physical damage caused by misuse

specialCases.title: Special Cases
specialCases.damaged: Product damaged in shipping: Immediate replacement at no cost
specialCases.defective: Defective product: Replacement or full refund
specialCases.missing: Missing parts: Immediate shipment of missing components

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about Nebu plans

q1.question: When will Nebu be available?
q1.answer: Nebu will be available in Q1 2026. Users who pre-order will get early access and special launch pricing.

q2.question: Can I change plans at any time?
q2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan at any time from your dashboard. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

q3.question: What ages are appropriate for Nebu?
q3.answer: Nebu is designed for children ages 5-15, with content adapted to different educational levels and learning styles.

q4.question: Is there any long-term commitment?
q4.answer: No, all our plans are monthly with no long-term commitments. You can cancel anytime without penalties.
